remarks: Lemma for ~ dvfsumrlim .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-May-2016.)
statement:
dvfsum.s $e |- S = ( T (,) +oo ) $.
dvfsum.z $e |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) $.
dvfsum.m $e |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) $.
dvfsum.d $e |- ( ph -> D e. RR ) $.
dvfsum.md $e |- ( ph -> M <_ ( D + 1 ) ) $.
dvfsum.t $e |- ( ph -> T e. RR ) $.
dvfsum.a $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. S ) -> A e. RR ) $.
dvfsum.b1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. S ) -> B e. V ) $.
dvfsum.b2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. Z ) -> B e. RR ) $.
dvfsum.b3 $e |- ( ph -> ( RR _D ( x e. S |-> A ) ) = ( x e. S |-> B ) ) $.
dvfsum.c $e |- ( x = k -> B = C ) $.
dvfsum.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. RR* ) $.
dvfsum.l $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. S /\ k e. S ) /\ ( D <_ x /\ x <_ k /\ k <_ U ) ) -> C <_ B ) $.
dvfsum.h $e |- H = ( x e. S |-> ( ( ( x - ( |_ ` x ) ) x. B ) + ( sum_ k e. ( M ... ( |_ ` x ) ) C - A ) ) ) $.
dvfsumlem1.1 $e |- ( ph -> X e. S ) $.
dvfsumlem1.2 $e |- ( ph -> Y e. S ) $.
dvfsumlem1.3 $e |- ( ph -> D <_ X ) $.
dvfsumlem1.4 $e |- ( ph -> X <_ Y ) $.
dvfsumlem1.5 $e |- ( ph -> Y <_ U ) $.
dvfsumlem3 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( H ` Y ) <_ ( H ` X ) /\ ( ( H ` X ) - [_ X / x ]_ B ) <_ ( ( H ` Y ) - [_ Y / x ]_ B ) ) ) $.
